errors.search: An error occured trying to find that card. Please try refreshing the page and try again. If the error occurs, please contact the project owner.

initialSearchSuggestion.label:
Search a card by its card number found in the bottom right corner of the card.

For example, to search "Uzuri, Switchblade", you can enter any of the following card numbers: "HER077", "OUT001", "WIN021".

noSearchResult.suggestion: Please check the card number is correct; it should start with 3 letters then end with 3 numbers. For example "DYN122". If it's still not finding a result, the card probably isn't added in to this app's database, please notify the project owner.
